name: Thunder Tap
description:
Check out Thunder Tap, the game that's blown away the competition, and lead a raging storm on a destructive stroll through town! Players who love destruction will love Thunder Tap!



- Use your finger to aim lightning blasts
- Blast cars and buildings to earn points
- Zap several targets at once to start a combo
- Earn enough points before you reach the sea to move on to the next level


Grab Thunder Tap and see what all the talk was about!
